title: So....Do I win the Harrowing?
body: i bought 2 harrowing skins and this is my remaining RP, i think i win

replies.body: Hi Katey, I would like to know if you know why i dont have my silver 3 rewards. Plz reply

> Hi Katey, I would like to know if you know why i dont have my silver 3 rewards. Plz reply

The season isn't over yet.
oh so you receive everything when the season ends ok thx
Hey! I can't play tomorrow anymore :(. Not sure if you saw my reply or not.

> Hey! I can't play tomorrow anymore :(. Not sure if you saw my reply or not.

No worries, we can figure something out. :3
You should get a free Teemo skin for that :P
I can almost see the smile on RiotAmes's face.
This has happened on two occations wow
i played three game no icon ? what to do ????

Same here, I have played and won three games and no icon at all, and the matches are not even showing up in the match history in the game or in the website!

I don't know if this is the way it is suppose to work or if this is a bug in the system.

Another thing I have been noticing is that all the games I have been playing on this Halloween event and the ascended one too, none of my matches counted for my total games won. I think this is a bug. DO someone have the same issue on this?
